qas.question: What notable historical event occurred in Japan in 1868?
In what region did the Japanese attempt to build up their power after 1868?
Along with fishermen, what sort of Japanese people visited the Marshalls?

context: Under German control, and even before then, Japanese <a2_0>traders<a2_0/> and fishermen from time to time visited the Marshall Islands, although contact with the islanders was irregular. After <a0_0>the Meiji Restoration<a0_0/> (1868), the Japanese government adopted a policy of turning the Japanese Empire into a great economic and military power in <a1_0>East Asia<a1_0/>.
